name: Recurrent
description:
"Recurrent is a psychological horror, where you play as a struggling indie game developer. Currently suffering from writer's block and several other ailments, you return to your day job to make ends meet. Unfortunately, the nightmares start soon after." 

This is a work in progress project, some gameplay may change over time. As of right now, this is what I've completed. 

The game is based off of my own nightmares, and a real apartment.

For more information about Periltek, check us out on our itch page, Youtube, Facebook, or Twitter.
